name: Add Google Sheets rows for new Memberful subscriptions created
description: Every time a new subscription is created in your Memberful, Make will automatically add a Google Sheets row. Here's the [sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1gD0ScQqx1Pgw3MqU1GEjgFs4svY2_CnbEs2ptcvCPIM/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario.
